Return Data.generated_title: ProMax Wireless Headphones - Premium Noise Cancelling with 30H Battery Life
Return Data.generated_description: Experience superior sound quality with ProMax Wireless Headphones featuring advanced Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity and powerful 40mm dynamic drivers. Our cutting-edge active noise cancellation technology blocks out distractions while delivering crystal-clear audio. With an impressive 30-hour battery life and quick charge capability, these wireless headphones keep you connected all day. The IPX4 water-resistant design makes them perfect for workouts and outdoor activities. Built-in microphone ensures seamless hands-free calls.
bullet_points: Advanced Bluetooth 5.2 for stable wireless connection
40mm dynamic drivers deliver rich, immersive sound
Active noise cancelling blocks external distractions
30-hour battery life with quick charge feature
IPX4 water resistance for active lifestyles
